category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_datamap_paste_output_options
preference.preference_description: Decides whether the output Item or Item revision created by the "CAE Data Mapping" functionality is pasted in the folder defined by preference "CAE_datamap_output_object_location". Valid values are Item (default) or ItemRevision.
